                   int threshold)

        kd - The differential constant.

                    int threshold)
        Set the PIDF of the talon.
        Parameters:
        kp - The proportional constant.
        ki - The integral constant.
        kd - The differential constant.
        kf - The feed forward constant.
        threshold - The error threshold of the PIDF loop.

      • setRamp

        public void setRamp(double secondsFromNeutralToFull)
        Sets the open loop ramp of a Talon SRX. This will limit the amount the power is allowed to change per tick.
        Parameters:
        secondsFromNeutralToFull - The seconds it takes to go from neutral (no power) to full (full power).
